title: J.Crew is discounting full-price and new styles this weekend
text:
J.Crew is discounting full-price and new styles this weekend

This sale is not to be missed if you like saving money on high quality, fashionable clothing. (Photo: J.Crew)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

It took me far too long to learn that spending more on higher-quality clothing will save you in the long-run. And while I still prefer to shop at second-hand stores, I seek out brands like J.Crew whenever possible. I also always keep my eye out for a good sale, and right now you can save 35% on full-price apparel at the preppy retailer.

This online-only sale includes everything that's not already discounted, even new arrivals so you can find on-trend pieces to add to your wardrobe or stock up on staples like basic tees and pants. All you have to do is use the promo code WEARNOW at checkout and you can watch your total price drop significantly. What a great feeling!
